course_description: This course intruduces students to the field of Health Economics.  This couse focuses on theoretical and empirical models expalining demand-side of health, emphasizing the difference between health as an outcome and medical care as one of the many inputs intot he production of health.
schedule_location: TTh 10am-11:15am in Emerson Chemistry Bldg. E103
